text:
rain is coming,
don't forget an umbrella,
or it will be disaster

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this song?

snow is still falling,
is it time for apres yet?
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot cat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the bat
